title: Basement Skates Mechanic
tagline: Skate with Confidence, Repair with Care
site_description: Welcome to the Basement Skates Mechanic, a boutique skate repair shop based in Atlanta where we work on roller skates!  Feel free to contact me through text or phone call and I'll be happy to help you with your skate repair needs.  My skate repair "shop" is in the Atlanta area, but I'm happy to service and maintain your skates if you are outside the Atlanta area.  Contact me if you want the personal neighborly service.  I also provide skate pickup/drop-off, within a 5 mile radius, for $10.
